title: How to choose the best fitness tracker in 2019 - Quora

response.answer_text: Start by asking what you want to get out of it. My vote is one of the new Fitbits. It tracks: Sleep (hours, type, and provides a sleep score).Resting heart rate and heart rate throughout the day and execises.You can track your calories if you’d like.You can integrate it with the Fitbit Aria smart scale to automatically track your weight and body fat percentage.Steps and calories burnt during the day or during a workout.
